MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY10 postcode area of Oswestry affecting a number of properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:53pm. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:58pm on the 9th April 2021.
